Rulings.Base: 1. Ignition Effects on monsters cannot be activated while the Effect Monster is face-down. So this face-down monster cannot be Tributed for its own effect.\n2. If you take control of your opponent's "Black Dragon's Chick", you can activate its effect. In this case, the "Black Dragon's Chick" is sent to your opponent's GY, but you get to Special Summon "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" from your hand.
